CustomField.formula: TEXT(FLOOR( Time_Elapsed_Hours_24hr_day__c )) + ' h ' + TEXT( FLOOR( ( ROUND(Time_Elapsed_Hours_24hr_day__c,2)-FLOOR(Time_Elapsed_Hours_24hr_day__c) ) * 60 ) ) + ' min'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the total hours from the field "Time Elapsed (24 hr day)" in hours and minutes
CustomField.label: Time Elapsed (24 hr, Display Hrs & Min)
